description: Test your skills in creating an effective CV
objectives: Tailor a CV to a specific job
generated_text:
**Module 10: CV**
Test your skills in creating an effective CV. This 70-minute quiz is designed for intermediate learners. Evaluate your understanding of CV structure, content, and formatting. Assess your ability to tailor a CV to a specific job and highlight relevant skills and experience. Complete 10 multiple-choice questions to gauge your knowledge and receive feedback for improvement.
